Введите логин и пароль: Type in your login and password
Нажимая кнопку Далее вы принимаете услов: By clicking Next, you accept the terms of the Agreement and the Privacy Policy
Вы действительно хотите выйти из аккаунт: Do you really want to log out of your account?
registration_info: To activate the account, enter your unique ID and password.
registration_info2: Create a new login and password. The recommended login is your phone number. The password can contain only numbers and letters of the Latin alphabet.
Проверьте правильность ввода нового паро: The passwords you entered do not match
Пароль должен содержать не менее 6 симво: A password must contain at least 6 symbols, including letters of the Latin alphabet and numbers
Пожалуйста, заполните все поля: Please fill in all the fields
Убедитесь_в_почте: Please check if your E-mail input is correct. You will receive a link to activate your account. This is necessary to restore your password if you forget it.
Check email: Further instructions how to activate your account are sent to your E-mail.
Здесь Вы можете задать любой вопрос о ра: Here you can ask any question about the application.
Сообщение в поддержку отправлено: Your tech.support message has been sent.
Для добавления ученика введите выданные: To add a student, enter your unique student ID and password.
Для восстановления: To recover your password, enter E-mail address you specified during registration.
Check email2: Further instructions how to recover your password have been sent to your specified E-mail.
